author: craigmcc
msg: Work around a bug in the IBM 1.1.8 JVM for Linux, where the method
Class.getResource() returns a bogus URL.  The revised code is arranged so
that getResourceAsStream() can be used instead, which seems to work
correctly.

author: craigmcc
msg: Grumble ... grumble ... Windows and file paths ...

author: craigmcc
msg: Update XmlMapper to support optional validation, and optional registration
of local URLs for the resolveEntity() call.  Using this feature avoids
having to go out across the Internet when parsing.
Update WebXmlReader to register the local copy of the deployment
descriptor DTD file (in $TOMCAT_HOME/conf/web.dtd), and to use a
validating parser when parsing web.xml files.  This will have the side
effect of breaking Tomcat startup for applications with web.xml files that
do not conform to the DTD.
NOTE:  At this point, Tomcat's servlet container is fully compliant with
JAXP-based selection of the XML parser to be used.  The JSP implementation
still throws an exception when running the "simple custom tag example" --
I am going to look at that issue next.

author: nacho
msg: Fixed some typos and changed to match actual incarnation of ant

author: craigmcc
msg: Use JAXP to select the parser to be used.
FIXME - Currently, there is no mechanism to request validation (which you
would want when parsing "web.dtd").  I will be looking at this.
